title: Tsundere Shark Tahm Kench (art by me)
body:
****TAHM KENCH: ACADEMY? skin****
{{champion:223}} 



I have a skin idea thats rather comedic. Some (or few) people may know of the strange internet meme/trend called [Tsundere Shark](http://i.imgur.com/s3j7Ffm.jpg), granted, Tahm Kench is a catfish, but thats probably as close to a shark as we are going to get, champion wise.

Tsundere Shark is a whole subreddit of giggles, I'm not sure how it started but now its a thing and there is no going back.

**Running Animation**
[RUNNING CLICHE](http://img1.ak.crunchyroll.com/i/spire1/f66b734d4d37efb797c198a0e7ff2db21437026076_full.png)
Like any Tsundere/Japanese Anime schoolgirl, tahm Kench is just out the door after breakfast!
His running animation should include toast in the mouth and lots of frantic-ness for Ghost/Speed boosts.

**/Joke**
Tahm Kench should drop his toast, blush and sway side to side. His disguise is bulletproof. No one will suspect that cute schoolgirl is actually Kench.

**Taunt**
Blows a raspberry at the enemy team, hands on hips. 

**death**
Tahm Kench-chan falls over to the side, too embarassed to continue. Senpai looked her/his way!


**Other...**
feel free to add in comments, I seriously want this to happen. Please let me know how you feel about this skin, how much do you think it should cost?

I believe this should be a 1300ish skin, over a 900 skin.

replies.body: "I-It's not like I think you're delicious or anything!"
{{champion:223}} "D-Don't get the wrong idea, I only ate you cause I was hungry. I wasn't trying to save you from Cait's Ult, Baka!" =>.>=
The skin we never knew we always wanted
Oh, yes. Senpai will definitely notice him.
Only if all his voice clips are pitched up ludicrously high.
I don't know whether to be horrified or interested.  Good creativity at least, i would have never pinned Tahm as a anime girl. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Don't listen to the haters Kench-Chan, every inch of you is perfect from the bottom to the top.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
RITO MAKE THIS A SKIN PLZZZ {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
I mean, besides the teeth, TK's basically a big, fat, green, cute and cuddly fish. What a perfect skin idea!

I think Tahm should have a bow separated into three parts to replace the fish icon marks for his passive.

In addition, when he has has the three marks stacked on a champion,  when his animation is his mouth flailing open and chomping he should yell (every player can hear) "NOTICE MEEEEE!" as he chases down his next snack.

I think style wise the school girl shirt should be shorter to show Tahms gut when it jiggles around.

The death animation could stay the same. Just have a piece of toast on the tip if his tounge.

Love this idea! 20/10 would buy.
Kench-Chan, a new school - a new you!
I never wanted Tahm Cruise till now {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
Why do I suddenly wish Academy Annie to be a skin now (Kench was my main btw)
Sailor Kench! who said LoL champs couldn't cosplay
Please leave as many comments as you can guys!
